At experience level 12 and higher, thieves do have this tendacy to 
stay invisible and attack you.  It can be annoying finding invisible 
thieves when you have frozen time.  They stay invisible for the entire 
duration [which I don't want to change; in a certain one of the 
tevfifty, I kept my mega-thief invisible just to keep him safe when 
time is frozen.] so I resorted to waiting for time to become NORMAL.
